short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to unlock old versions of Lovatts Crytic Crosswords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you enjoy Lovatts Cryptic Crosswords? Wish you could play past puzzles?

Cryptic Time Travel is a browser extension that tricks the game into loading older crosswords. Simply add ?offset=xxxx to the URL, where "xxxx" is the number of days you want to travel into the past. Then, you can enjoy Cryptic Crosswords from the past!
